config.script:
project = "RITI" 
	participant_id = self.params.participantID
	results = []
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Participant ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Get KPI Info
			path = "Participants/KPI/Detail/IncidentDetail"
			parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
			#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note: ' + str(employer_id))
			results = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		

			if results is not None:
				#KPI1 Total Incidents		
				#totalIncidents = results.getRowCount()
				totalIncidents = participant_id		
				"""#KPI1 Hire Percentage		
				hireDecisions = 0
				hiredApplicants = 0
				for row in range(results.getRowCount()):
					if results.getValueAt(row, "hired_state") is not None:
						hireDecisions += 1
						if results.getValueAt(row, "hired_state"):
							hiredApplicants += 1
							
				hiredApplicantsfloat = float(hiredApplicants)
				hireDecisionsfloat = float(hireDecisions)
				if hireDecisionsfloat > 1:
					hirePercent = int((hiredApplicantsfloat/hireDecisionsfloat)*100)
				else:
					hirePercent = 0
				"""	
				#KPI3 Applicants A Month
				MonthCount = 6
				incidentsMonthly = []
				now = system.date.now()
				for i in reversed(range(MonthCount)):
					imonthago = system.date.addMonths(now, -i)
					cmonthago = system.date.addMonths(imonthago, 1)
					month = system.date.getMonth(imonthago) + 1
					dateMonth = system.date.getMonth(imonthago)
					dateYear = system.date.getYear(imonthago)
					date = system.date.getDate(dateYear, dateMonth, 01)
					datetime = system.date.setTime(date, 00, 00, 00)
					append_item = {"time": system.date.format(datetime, "M/d/yyyy") , "incidents": 0}
					resultMonths = 0
					for row in range(results.getRowCount()):
						resultMonth = results.getValueAt(row, "incident_date")
						if month == resultMonth:
							resultMonths += 1
							
					append_item["incidents"] = resultMonths
					incidentsMonthly.append(append_item)

					#Update Detail KPIs
					system.perspective.sendMessage("totalIncidentsDetail", payload = {"totalIncidentsDetail": totalIncidents}, scope = "session")
					#system.perspective.sendMessage("hirePercentDetail", payload = {"hirePercentDetail": hirePercent}, scope = "session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage("participantsDetailIncidentsPerMonth", payload = {"incidentsMonthly": incidentsMonthly}, scope = "session")
				
			else:
				#Update Detail KPIs
				system.perspective.sendMessage("totalApplicantsDetail", payload = {"totalApplicantsDetail": 0}, scope = "session")
				system.perspective.sendMessage("hirePercentDetail", payload = {"hirePercentDetail": 0}, scope = "session")	
				
			
		except:
			logger = system.util.getLogger("Employer get KPI data failed on Detail ActivityFeed tab onStartUp")
			#msg = traceback.format_exc()
			#logger.error(msg)	
	else:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("No Employer ID to get KPI data, failed on Detail ActivityFeed tab onStartUp")
		#msg = traceback.format_exc()
		#logger.error(msg)

transforms.code:
import traceback
	try:
		#system.perspective.print('Participants Activity Feed Refresh')
		display_list = ['Header']#Always display the date headers
		filters = self.getChild("root").getChild("Embed_Filter").props.params.selection
		#filters = None
		if filters is not None:
			for filter in range(len(filters)):
				display_list.append(str(filters[filter]))
		system.perspective.print(display_list)
		#instances is the data object to return
		instances = []
		#Iterate over the results of the query
		for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
			object = {}
			object['ID'] = value.getValueAt(row, "ID")
			object['CardType'] = value.getValueAt(row, "CardType")
			object['Date'] = system.date.toMillis(value.getValueAt(row, "Date"))
			object['Size'] = ""
			if len(display_list) > 1:#A filter exists if > 1
				if object['CardType'] in display_list:
					instances.append(object)
			else:#No filters
				instances.append(object)
		
		return instances
	
	
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ActivityFeed FlexRepeater_Activity.props.instances")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

onChange.script:
project = "RITI" 
	participant_id = self.params.participantID
	results = []
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		#system.perspective.print("Participant ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		#system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Get KPI Info
			path = "Participants/KPI/Detail/IncidentDetail"
			parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
			#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note: ' + str(employer_id))
			results = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)

			if results is not None:
				if results.getRowCount() > 0:
					#system.perspective.print("Results Not None")
					
					#KPI1 Total Incidents		
					totalIncidents = results.getRowCount()
					#totalIncidents = paticipant_id
					#system.perspective.print("KPI1")
							
					#KPI2 Days Since Last Incident		
					now = system.date.now()
					lastIncident = results.getValueAt(results.getRowCount() - 1, "incident_date")
					daysLastIncidnet = system.date.daysBetween(lastIncident, now)
					#system.perspective.print("KPI2")
					
					#KPI3 Applicants A Month
					MonthCount = 6
					incidentsMonthly = []
					now = system.date.now()
					for i in reversed(range(MonthCount)):
						imonthago = system.date.addMonths(now, -i)
						cmonthago = system.date.addMonths(imonthago, 1)
						month = system.date.getMonth(imonthago) + 1
						dateMonth = system.date.getMonth(imonthago)
						dateYear = system.date.getYear(imonthago)
						date = system.date.getDate(dateYear, dateMonth, 01)
						datetime = system.date.setTime(date, 00, 00, 00)
						append_item = {"time": system.date.format(datetime, "M/d/yyyy") , "incidents": 0}
						resultMonths = 0
						for row in range(results.getRowCount()):
							resultMonth = results.getValueAt(row, "incident_month")
							if month == resultMonth:
								resultMonths += 1
								
						append_item["incidents"] = resultMonths
						incidentsMonthly.append(append_item)
						#system.perspective.print("KPI3")
						
					#Update Detail KPIs
					system.perspective.sendMessage("totalIncidentsDetail", payload = {"totalIncidentsDetail": totalIncidents}, scope = "page")
					system.perspective.sendMessage("daysLastIncidnetDetail", payload = {"daysLastIncidnet": daysLastIncidnet}, scope = "page")
					system.perspective.sendMessage("participantsDetailIncidentsPerMonth", payload = {"incidentsMonthly": incidentsMonthly}, scope = "page")
					
				else:
					#Update Detail KPIs
					system.perspective.sendMessage("totalIncidentsDetail", payload = {"totalIncidentsDetail": 0}, scope = "session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage("daysLastIncidnetDetail", payload = {"daysLastIncidnet": 0}, scope = "session")
					#KPI3 Update
					MonthCount = 6
					incidentsMonthly = []
					now = system.date.now()
					for i in reversed(range(MonthCount)):
						imonthago = system.date.addMonths(now, -i)
						cmonthago = system.date.addMonths(imonthago, 1)
						month = system.date.getMonth(imonthago) + 1
						dateMonth = system.date.getMonth(imonthago)
						dateYear = system.date.getYear(imonthago)
						date = system.date.getDate(dateYear, dateMonth, 01)
						datetime = system.date.setTime(date, 00, 00, 00)
						append_item = {"time": system.date.format(datetime, "M/d/yyyy") , "incidents": 0}
						incidentsMonthly.append(append_item)
						
					system.perspective.sendMessage("participantsDetailIncidentsPerMonth", payload = {"incidentsMonthly": incidentsMonthly}, scope = "session")	
					
					#system.perspective.print("KPI No Row Data Update")
			else:
				#Update Detail KPIs
				system.perspective.sendMessage("totalIncidentsDetail", payload = {"totalIncidentsDetail": 0}, scope = "session")
				system.perspective.sendMessage("daysLastIncidnetDetail", payload = {"daysLastIncidnet": 0}, scope = "session")
				#KPI3 Update
				MonthCount = 6
				incidentsMonthly = []
				now = system.date.now()
				for i in reversed(range(MonthCount)):
					imonthago = system.date.addMonths(now, -i)
					cmonthago = system.date.addMonths(imonthago, 1)
					month = system.date.getMonth(imonthago) + 1
					dateMonth = system.date.getMonth(imonthago)
					dateYear = system.date.getYear(imonthago)
					date = system.date.getDate(dateYear, dateMonth, 01)
					datetime = system.date.setTime(date, 00, 00, 00)
					append_item = {"time": system.date.format(datetime, "M/d/yyyy") , "incidents": 0}
					incidentsMonthly.append(append_item)
					
				system.perspective.sendMessage("participantsDetailIncidentsPerMonth", payload = {"incidentsMonthly": incidentsMonthly}, scope = "session")	
				
				#system.perspective.print("KPI Dataset Is None Update")			
		except:
			logger = system.util.getLogger("Participant get KPI data failed on Detail ActivityFeed tab onStartUp")
			#msg = traceback.format_exc()
			#logger.error(msg)	
			#system.perspective.print("KPI Except")
	else:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("No Participant ID to get KPI data, failed on Detail ActivityFeed tab onStartUp")
		#msg = traceback.format_exc()
		#logger.error(msg)
		#system.perspective.print("KPI Else")
